title: Research and modern housing
creator_credit: Richard F. Tambling, Julian Wintle and Verity Films
brief_description: Describes the work and experiments carried out at the Building Research Station of the Department of Scientific and Industrial Research, England. Shows new ideas for better, cheaper and quicker building techniques and the way this is helping to solve postwar housing problems in Britain.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard F. Tambling, Julian Wintle and Verity Films
